about_the_game:
Embark on an emotional 2D platformer journey with SHADE.

Inspired by a true story, this captivating game seamlessly blends the thrill of speed running with a heartwarming narrative. Join Shade, a loyal Border Collie, and his loving family as they navigate challenges, overcome obstacles, and celebrate the enduring bonds of love.

Key Features:


Emotional Narrative: Explore an immersive story across 11 chapters, each unlocked by mastering speed running challenges. Live Shade's real-life tale alongside a devoted family.

Dynamic Speed Running: Run, jump, and dodge through visually stunning and emotionally charged levels. Hone your skills to achieve the best scores and unlock rewarding upgrades.

Upgrades and Unlocks: Customize Shade throughout the journey by enhancing endurance, gaining extra lives, and earning wings for an exhilarating double jump.

Real-Life Inspired Story: Grounded in true events, the narrative delivers poignant moments, from Shade's adoption to medical challenges, forging a unique connection with the characters.

Enchanting Visuals: Immerse yourself in vibrant graphics and captivating atmospheres, traversing serene farms, bustling cities, and enchanting forests.

"SHADE: A Dog's Expedition" is more than a game; it's a heartfelt odyssey that resonates with players, offering a distinctive 2D platformer experience that transcends the ordinary. Get ready for an adventure that warms your heart and tests your speed running skills.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U CPU @ 1.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K CPU @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: N/A
